001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.ui;
002
003import com.google.inject.Inject;
004import com.google.inject.Singleton;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView;
006
007import javax.swing.*;
008import java.awt.*;
009import java.awt.event.FocusEvent;
010import java.awt.event.FocusListener;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014@Singleton
015public class EmailCredentialsDialog extends JDialog implements EmailCredentialsView {
016
017  private final JTextField emailAddressField = new JTextField(30);
018  private final JPasswordField passwordField = new JPasswordField(30);
019  private final JButton okButton = new JButton("OK");
020  private final JButton cancelButton = new JButton("Cancel");
021  private final List<SubmitCredentialsListener> submitCredentialsListeners = new ArrayList<>();
022
023  @Inject
024  public EmailCredentialsDialog(TopLevelJFrame parent) {
025    super(parent, "Enter Email Credentials", true);
026    this.setVisible(false);
027
028    Container rootPane1 = this.getContentPane();
029    rootPane1.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
030    rootPane1.add(createCredentialsPanel(), BorderLayout.CENTER);
031    rootPane1.add(createOkCancelPanel(), BorderLayout.SOUTH);
032
033    this.cancelButton.addActionListener(e -> hideDialog());
034    this.okButton.addActionListener(e -> submitCredentials());
035
036    this.pack();
037
038    Dimension dimension = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getScreenSize();
039    int x = (int) ((dimension.getWidth() - this.getWidth()) / 2);
040    int y = (int) ((dimension.getHeight() - this.getHeight()) / 2);
041    this.setLocation(x, y);
042
043  }
044
045  private JPanel createOkCancelPanel() {
046    JPanel panel = new JPanel();
047    BoxLayout layout = new BoxLayout(panel, BoxLayout.LINE_AXIS);
048    panel.setLayout(layout);
049
050    panel.add(Box.createHorizontalGlue());
051    panel.add(okButton);
052    panel.add(cancelButton);
053
054    return panel;
055  }
056
057  private JPanel createCredentialsPanel() {
058    JPanel credentialsPanel = new JPanel(new GridBagLayout());
059    addComponentOnGrid(new JLabel("Email Address:"), credentialsPanel, 0, 0);
060    addComponentOnGrid(this.emailAddressField, credentialsPanel, 0, 1);
061    addComponentOnGrid(new JLabel("Password:"), credentialsPanel, 1, 0);
062    addComponentOnGrid(this.passwordField, credentialsPanel, 1, 1);
063
064    return credentialsPanel;
065  }
066
067  private void addComponentOnGrid(JComponent component, JPanel container, int row, int column) {
068    GridBagConstraints constraints = new GridBagConstraints();
069    constraints.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
070    constraints.gridx = column;
071    constraints.gridy = row;
072
073    container.add(component, constraints);
074  }
075
076
077  @Override
078  public void setIsVisible(boolean isVisible) {
079    this.pack();
080    this.setVisible(isVisible);
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public void addEmailAddressValueListener(EmailAddressValueListener listener) {
085    this.emailAddressField.addFocusListener(new FocusListener() {
086      @Override
087      public void focusGained(FocusEvent e) {
088
089      }
090
091      @Override
092      public void focusLost(FocusEvent e) {
093        listener.setEmailAddress(emailAddressField.getText());
094      }
095    });
096
097    this.emailAddressField.addActionListener(e -> {
098      listener.setEmailAddress(emailAddressField.getText());
099      submitCredentials();
100    });
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  public void addPasswordValueListener(PasswordValueListener listener) {
105    this.passwordField.addFocusListener(new FocusListener() {
106      @Override
107      public void focusGained(FocusEvent e) {
108
109      }
110
111      @Override
112      public void focusLost(FocusEvent e) {
113        listener.setPassword(getPasswordFromWidget());
114      }
115    });
116
117    this.passwordField.addActionListener(e -> {
118      listener.setPassword(getPasswordFromWidget());
119      submitCredentials();
120    });
121  }
122
123  private void submitCredentials() {
124    this.submitCredentialsListeners.forEach(this::submitCredentials);
125  }
126
127  private String getPasswordFromWidget() {
128    return new String(passwordField.getPassword());
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  public void addSubmitCredentialsListener(SubmitCredentialsListener listener) {
133    this.submitCredentialsListeners.add(listener);
134  }
135
136  private void submitCredentials(SubmitCredentialsListener listener) {
137    listener.submitCredentials();
138    hideDialog();
139  }
140
141  private void hideDialog() {
142    this.setVisible(false);
143  }
144
145}
